data.name: Devilian - Devil Pack
data.detailed_description:
Leap into battle with this devilish treasure trove. Get 16 inventory slots, a 3-day Elara's Blessing, 25 Megaphones, and a brand new Talisman!

2 Inventory Expansion Tickets

Gain 16 additional Inventory slots

3-day Elara's Blessing

Earn 50% more XP and Devil Souls

25 Megaphones

Broadcast a message to the whole world

Furious Jirah Talisman

Earn 5% more XP and 2.5% more Gold in Dungeons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GTX / AMD HD 5670
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Registered Trion Account, Glyph Client, and acceptance of License and Usage terms
